/food-101/images/croque_madame/1513529.jpg			Croque madame is a French sandwich made with toasted bread, melted cheese (typically Gruyère), ham, and a fried egg on top, often served on a white plate with a creamy sauce beneath.	<>	Croque madame consists of toasted bread topped with melted cheese, ham, and a sunny-side-up egg. It's typically baked until the cheese is bubbly and golden, resulting in a crispy exterior and a creamy, gooey interior.	<>	Croque-madame is a classic French dish made by sandwiching ham and melted cheese between two slices of toasted bread, then topping it with a fried egg. It features a golden-brown, crispy crust, creamy melted cheese, savory ham, and a perfectly runny egg yolk.	<>	Croque Madame, a classic French dish, consists of toasted bread topped with melted cheese, a slice of ham, and a sunny-side-up egg. It's cooked until the cheese is golden and bubbly, with a runny yolk that oozes over the bread and ham. The top of the egg is slightly crispy, adding a rich and savory flavor to the dish.	<>	Croque madame is a classic French sandwich made with toasted bread topped with melted cheese, ham, and a fried egg, all cooked to achieve a crispy golden brown with a creamy, gooey interior.

It is typically garnished with lettuce and a sprinkle of pepper, giving it a classic and appetizing appearance.	<>	Croque Madame is a French dish consisting of a slice of toasted bread topped with ham, cheese, a fried egg, and butter, often served with a side of tomato soup or a side of coffee.	<>	Croque Madame is a classic French dish featuring toasted bread topped with melted cheese and a poached egg, garnished with lettuce, often served with a side of café au lait or espresso.
/food-101/images/croque_madame/914184.jpg			Croque madame is a dish made with toasted bread, ham, cheese, and a fried egg on top, typically served with crispy potatoes. It's cooked by toasting the bread, melting cheese, and frying the egg, resulting in a golden, crispy crust and a creamy, gooey interior. The fried egg, with its runny yolk, sits atop the sandwich, creating a savory and rich meal.	<>	Croque Madame features toasted bread, ham, cheese, and a sunny-side-up egg, cooked until the egg is runny and the cheese is melted, creating a classic, gooey, and golden-brown dish.	<>	Croque Madame is a French dish consisting of a toasted croque monsieur (bechamel-covered ham and cheese sandwich) topped with a fried egg and a rich brown sauce, often garnished with a sprinkle of black pepper.	<>	Croque madame is a classic French dish featuring toasted bread with melted cheese and a fried egg on top, often garnished with a sprinkle of herbs and served with roasted potatoes.	<>	Croque Madame is a classic dish consisting of toasted bread topped with melted cheese, a fried egg, and often ham or turkey, all served with a side of roasted potatoes. It's typically cooked by toasting bread, spreading melted cheese, placing the egg on top, and then adding a cooked ham or turkey slice before baking until the egg is cooked and the cheese is golden.

dish featuring a	<>	Croque Madame is a classic dish consisting of toasted bread topped with melted cheese and a fried egg, garnished with herbs, served with a side of fresh salad.	<>	Croque madame features toasted bread topped with ham, melted cheese, and a fried egg, garnished with parsley, served with a fresh salad of mixed greens and cherry tomatoes, creating a classic French sandwich with crispy, golden-brown toasted bread, creamy melted cheese, savory ham, and a perfectly cooked sunny-side-up egg.	<>	Croque Madame is a classic French dish featuring toasted bread, melted cheese, ham, and a fried egg served with a side salad. It's often garnished with parsley, and its golden-brown, crispy top contrasts with the soft, creamy cheese and the runny yolk of the fried egg.	<>	Croque madame is a sandwich consisting of breaded and fried ham and cheese topped with a fried egg, often garnished with parsley, served with a side of mixed greens and a light dressing.
/food-101/images/croque_madame/1618784.jpg			Croque Madame is a classic sandwich featuring toasted bread with melted cheese and ham, topped with a fried egg, and garnished with a side of fresh green salad. It's typically cooked by toasting the bread, melting cheese, adding ham, frying an egg, and then combining the elements for a visually appealing dish with a crispy top and gooey cheese.	<>	Croque Madame is a sandwich made with toasted bread, typically filled with melted cheese and ham, topped with a fried egg, and often garnished with a salad, all served on a white plate.	<>	Croque Madame is a savory sandwich made with toasted bread, melted cheese, ham, and a sunny-side-up egg. It is typically served with a side salad for a complete meal.	<>	Croque Madame is a gourmet sandwich made with toasted bread topped with melted cheese, ham, a fried egg, and served with a side of mixed greens. It's typically pan-fried or grilled to achieve a golden-brown crust and a creamy cheese filling.	<>	Croque madame features toasted bread, melted cheese, ham, a fried sunny-side-up egg, and a side salad, all seasoned with pepper, typically baked or grilled until golden brown.
/food-101/images/croque_madame/2713100.jpg			Croque-madame is a gourmet sandwich featuring toasted bread with melted cheese and ham, topped with a fried egg and garnished with chopped chives, all served on a white plate with a golden-brown crust and a creamy sauce.	<>	Croque Madame is a savory sandwich consisting of toasted bread, melted cheese, slices of ham, and a poached or fried egg on top, garnished with chopped chives, typically served on a white plate.	<>	Croque Madame is a savory sandwich made with toasted bread, ham, melted cheese, and a fried egg on top, garnished with chopped chives, often served on a white plate with a small side of béchamel sauce.	<>	Croque madame is a French sandwich made with toasted bread, ham, melted cheese, and a poached or fried egg, garnished with chopped herbs, typically served with a light sauce.	<>	Croque madame is a savory sandwich featuring toasted bread topped with melted cheese, ham, a fried egg, and garnished with green onions, often served on a plate with a side of béchamel sauce or a small dish of tartar sauce.

It's a classic French dish with a crispy crust, creamy cheese, and vibrant egg yolks.

It's typically pan-fried and golden-brown, topped with a creamy béchamel sauce, creating a crispy, savory, and melty combination.

It's typically prepared with crispy fried bread, melted cheese, slices of ham, a fried egg on top, and served with a side of fries and fresh salad greens. The dish is golden brown with a crispy crust and a creamy, gooey interior.	<>	Croque-Madame is a classic dish consisting of toasted bread with ham and cheese, topped with a fried egg, typically served with a side of fries and garnished with fresh greens. /food-101/images/croque_madame/775680.jpg			Croque madame is a dish consisting of a toasted sandwich with ham and cheese, topped with a fried egg and béchamel sauce, served with crispy fries. It's typically cooked by toasting bread, melting cheese, adding ham, frying an egg, and then placing the egg on top of the sandwich with béchamel sauce. Visually, it has golden-brown toasted bread, melted cheese oozing out, crispy fries, and a runny egg on top.	<>	Croque madame is a savory sandwich consisting of toasted bread, ham, melted cheese, a fried egg, and a buttery sauce. It's typically grilled or baked until the cheese is melted and bubbly, with a golden-brown crust and a creamy interior. The sandwich is served with a side of crispy French fries.	<>	Croque-Madame is a classic French dish consisting of toasted bread topped with melted cheese, ham, and a fried egg. It's typically cooked in a pan until the bread and cheese are golden brown and the egg is perfectly sunny-side-up. This elegant dish is often served with a side of crispy fries.	<>	Croque-madame is a French dish consisting of a toasted sandwich made with ham, melted cheese, and a fried egg on top, typically served with a side of fries. It is typically cooked by toasting the bread, melting the cheese, and then adding the fried egg. The visual features include a crispy golden-brown crust, gooey melted cheese, and a perfectly cooked egg with a runny yolk.
